des: "When I went on a 6 day kayaking trip, our guides whipped this up one morning over the campfire.  It was delicious and I started making it at home."
ins: In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the milk, honey and cinnamon. As soon as it comes to a boil, stir in the couscous. Turn off the heat, cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Stir in the apricots, raisins and almonds.
